name: Kalyani Mohite
headline: Data Analyst | SQL, Python, Power BI | MS CS @ GMU (May 2025)
summary: Computer Science graduate passionate about data analysis and building meaningful solutions. Enjoys working at the intersection of logic and creativity, creating dashboards, analyzing patterns, and developing apps that improve everyday tasks.

experience.title: Data Analyst
highlights: Migrated & modeled 1 TB marketing + CRM data on AWS S3/Redshift/dbt; improved campaign ROI by 20%
Built Python ETL & optimized SQL scripts; +30% throughput, -40% manual effort
Collaborated on churn models (RF, LR) achieving 85%+ accuracy

experience.title: Data & Marketing Assistant
highlights: Redshift/PostgreSQL ETL for 500+ student records; +25% data accuracy, -40% pipeline runtime
Built Power BI/Tableau dashboards (drilldowns, scheduled refresh); -30% report time
Documented workflows & insights; supported 200+ data-driven decisions/quarter

experience.title: Data Analyst
highlights: Automated sentiment analysis for 2,000+ feedback entries; +12% retention
A/B tested recommendations; deployed via Flask app with monitoring

experience.title: Data Analyst Trainee
highlights: Azure Synapse pipelines for 500 GB/day; ~40% lower latency
Power BI with DAX + R visuals; cut ad-hoc report requests by half
Basic anomaly detection (Azure ML + Python); -15% incident resolution time

highlights: Flask on Google Cloud (Cloud Functions, BigQuery, Cloud Storage)
spaCy + TF-IDF + cosine similarity; near real-time (<500 ms) matching
-70% manual job-matching effort
